last_episode_to_air.name: Costa Rica: Desert Island
last_episode_to_air.overview: Series finale. Dropped off by a gruff fisherman on a Costa Rican island, Russell must tool up with enough internet knowledge to escape nature’s clutches, navigate the seas and find his way back to civilisation. His chosen companion this time comes in the shape of snowboarding heroine and Olympian Jenny Jones.

name: Stupid Man, Smart Phone
overview: Russell Kane, joined by a different online star every episode, is convinced that, even though they have no survival skills or knowledge of the local language or customs, they can be dropped anywhere in the world and survive with only their mobile phone for help.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Can you survive the most remote locations in the world using only your mobile phone? Russell Kane thinks so.

episodes.name: Morocco
episodes.overview: Joining our Stupid Man and his Smart Phone is online prankster, Arron Crascall. Challenges include making fire with camel dung, winning over the hearts of the remote Berber tribe, preparing and cooking a desert lizard that’s still moving, surviving an Egyptian cobra, giving each other rectal enemas…and generally coping with the boiling hot, dehydrating desert.

episodes.name: Norway
episodes.overview: Russell Kane is crossing into the deadly Arctic Circle, travelling as far north as he can go – desperate for a cheeky peak at the legendary and beautiful Northern Lights. His mission partners are YouTube’s beguiling wife and wife team - Rose and Rosie.

episodes.name: Costa Rican: Jungle
episodes.overview: Russell's in the Costa Rican jungle with YouTube singing superstar Conor Maynard for the most foolhardy mission yet, with just their mobile phone to help them survive. The Maleku tribe set the mission, which would be easy if it wasn't for deadly bullet ants, giant abseils and fast river crossings. Oh, and the fact that, for this task, internet reception rarely gets above one bar. Battling humidity and monsoon, the lads will have to convert their phones into multi-tools - using their backlights to attract grasshoppers for dinner - and rely on the inbuilt compass to navigate them safely back to civilisation.

episodes.name: Italy
episodes.overview: Russell Kane is going to new heights to prove the internet can transform him into a survival expert by climbing the historic Dolomite Mountains of Italy without any survival or climbing experience. He’s convinced that all knowledge of climbing and survival can be gleaned from his mobile phone, so he isn’t taking on any training; just a partner who has loads of online followers. And that partner is Badman, Muslim internet star, Humza Arshad.

episodes.name: Poland
episodes.overview: Joining Russell Kane is the rock ‘n’ roll, heartthrob internet star, TheMazziMaz. The useless pair are chased across Poland by scary-looking guards with dogs. Our hapless heroes are convinced that, even though they have no evasion or tracking skills or any ability to speak a word in Polish, they can evade capture by using just their mobile phones. They are sorely mistaken!

episodes.name: Costa Rica: Desert Island
episodes.overview: Series finale. Dropped off by a gruff fisherman on a Costa Rican island, Russell must tool up with enough internet knowledge to escape nature’s clutches, navigate the seas and find his way back to civilisation. His chosen companion this time comes in the shape of snowboarding heroine and Olympian Jenny Jones.
